channel.title: Making a rune defender/ making wepons going into defence slot!
channel.description:
Ok, i was talking to a friend who owns a server and he was asking me if i knew how to make a rune defender i said no, he could only get past the first stage witch acctually making the the wepon go into the defence slot but not into the right hand (wepon hand) so you where carring 2 wepons in 1 hand -.-.. i was wondering how i could make it so ur accutaly carring the wepon in the defence slot.. and the wepon that u want in the wepon slot..
if anyone could help ide be greatful :)

item.title: Making a rune defender/ making wepons going into defence slot!
item.dc:creator: @kalius kalius
item.description:
@kalius wrote:

im just looking for how to use when u got it yeah ur right you cant install new caches on mopar 3… so what do i do… look at this topic its a lil proof of what i need…

http://dodian.com/server-development/t-sellnew-summon-spells-3871.html/?highlight=cache

Read full topic

item.title: Making a rune defender/ making wepons going into defence slot!
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

kalius:

i know… but you dont read the top thread i need to know what to do with the new cache i got so i can get new item ids so i can get rune defender ID!

you won’t find that in the cache… [br][size=1]Posted at: September 30, 2006, 07:18:20 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Thebeanie, post:12, topic:16665”]item.java

just add the weapon you want in the sheild slot (will not work if its in weapon slot already)[/quote]

if you heaven’t noticed yet, for you to do that you need the Item ID… which he/she is asking for.

Read full topic
